======
README
======

Let's test the source code with our custom checker:

  >>> import p01.checker
  >>> import m01.gmap

  >>> skipFileNames = [
  ... ]

  >>> skipFolderNames = [
  ...     'plugins',
  ... ]

  >>> checker = p01.checker.Checker()
  >>> checker.check(m01.gmap, skipFileNames=skipFileNames,
  ...     skipFolderNames=skipFolderNames)
